'''Dave''' is a guy who went on a date with [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] in "[[The One With All The Kissing]]", portrayed by [[Zen Gesner]].

Rachel was upset that she makes bad choices in her love life, and asks [[Monica Geller|Monica]] to make her decisions for her. Monica then asks Rachel to go talk to a guy in the coffeehouse, and they go on a date.

After coming home from the date with Dave, Rachel wants to invite him in, but because Monica has to make that decision, Rachel asks Dan to wait in the hall, and Rachel enters. She doesn't find Monica though, but [[Ross Geller|Ross]] pining over his failing marriage, and she decides to console him and says goodbye to Dan.
